name: .SNP File Extension
summary: Learn about .SNP files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Snapshot of a report created in Microsoft Access; preserves the report layout, including the text and graphics; allows the report to be viewed by someone who does not have Access installed on his or her computer.

content: SNP files can be viewed using the free Microsoft Snapshot Viewer.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
